stories.headline: Vital Signs: Examining Hospital Health in New Jersey
stories.summary: A series titled 'Vital Signs' investigates the health of New Jersey hospitals, spurring significant discussion and action within the state's medical establishment.

stories.headline: Rocking the Rules: Neonatal Care in Ohio
stories.summary: An investigation into Ohio hospitals that circumvent rules to treat premature babies, exposing higher death rates in facilities with lower care levels.

stories.headline: What's the 911: EMT Response Time in Florida
stories.summary: A report on EMT response times in Hillsborough County, Florida, reveals the EMS system's failures in meeting national goals, influenced by computer-assisted reporting techniques.

stories.headline: Police Cruiser Costs in Oklahoma City
stories.summary: An investigation into the cost of maintaining police cruisers in Oklahoma City, highlighting excessive spending compared to national averages.
